website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-wear skates, which make them great for kids. Interior liner will keep feet warm, too.
pros: Quality skates for a young child that are far more comfortable than rental skates
The single-ratchet buckle system makes it easy to put them on and take them off quickly
cons: Curved blades may be a little tough for youngsters trying to learn to skate

customer_reviews.title: Best beginner skates ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skates for my two-year-old grandson. They are perfect a little big so they'll fit him again next season. They took him out to the skating rink and he absolutely loved it. Bauer has the best beginner skates for children. I'm an old time skater and know my skates. If you buy these for your children make sure you have them walk around the house with them. This will help them get used to the weight, help them with their balance and this will also strengthen their legs for when they do get on the ice.
customer_reviews.author: GracieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: You often hear about many athletes who started swimming, swinging a baseball bat, running with a football before they could walk. I can follow in the footsteps of many of those other grandparents and parents who dote on those moments while their progeny excel. And these skates REALLY contribute to those moments. Don't know if he'll become another Wayne Gretzky, but it doesn't hurt to have the right equipment. He just started walking about a month ago and wanted to get on the ice with his Dad, and brother and sister before he could walk. He's out there now. It may take some time but he seems already be getting the hang of skating. Lovin' it! Great skates!!!
